attributes.action: Rename Barrack Road in Newcastle upon Tyne the Sir Bobby Robson Boulevard
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon Newcastle City Council to rename Barrack Road, to the west of St James’ Park, the Sir Bobby Robson Boulevard.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Renaming local streets is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
